Chap. 3 - All on Test and Trial


                          From a Testimony sent to the 
                          General Conference, 1897. 


     In acquiring money, Christians are safe only as they follow God's direction, and use it in channels which He can bless. God permits us to use His goods with an eye single to His glory. He blesses us, that we may bless others. Those who have adopted the world's maxim, and discarded God's specifications, who grasp all they can obtain of wages or goods, are poor, poor indeed, because the frown of God is upon them. Walking in paths of their own choosing, they 
                                                                           6
do dishonor to God, to the truth, to His goodness, His mercy, His character.
